backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report stub with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high-level descriptions of main frontend files including App.tsx, styling, and placeholders.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based OKLCH variable theme with light/dark mode tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell with cacheâ€‘control headers and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA marketing site with sections, navigation, mobile menu, and URL token cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that instantiates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind OKLCH warm color palette and typography utilities for the marketing site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wiring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending OKLCH color tokens, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata showing deployment issue with Caffeine free domain and active feature request to publish.
